publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4482.1 Christine Grahame: Cross-cutting Expenditure Review of Deprivationâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-4482) in the name of Des McNulty, insert at end "; while commending the robustness of the report, notes that issues, such as those raised in the recommendations in paragraph 166 on rural deprivation and in paragraphs 179 and 181 on simplification of funding streams, have been raised frequently over the last seven years, and is concerned that to date these issues remain unresolved." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
